title: Jungler tiers?
body: As a jungle main, I've been encouraged to learn an upper level jungler to fall back on. I'm currently climbing through Silver and my Shaco main is working out well, but I've been told it'll be less and less effective as time goes on. If I were to pick a new jungler to practice (I currently know about 8 or 9 moderately well), who should I go for?

replies.body: The go-to would be Lee, he's perma top-tier and never gets nerfed(meaningfully).
Damn...anyone else? As a Shaco main, I'm basically programmed to hate/ban Lee. :P

I can relate to that :D  Not a shaco main but I hate him just the same being a mostly jungle player who doesn't use him :) 

 I'd recommend Sej, I think she's quite strong right now and brings alot to the table.  Also, doesn't seem like you can go wrong with j4 right now.
